Veteran defender Kolo Toure admits his biggest regret in an impressive playing career is not winning a trophy while at Liverpool.

“I nearly won the league with Liverpool (in 2014) and I feel privileged for that,” Toure, a Champions League runner-up with Arsenal in 2006, told Press Association Sport.

“That’s my only regret to be honest because we nearly won the Premier League and came so close twice in the final of the Europa League and League Cup.”

BREAKING: Jürgen Klopp has confirmed Liverpool are set to be without Adam Lallana for a significant period of time due to a thigh injury.

Lallana sustained the issue during the Reds’ Audi Cup final with Atletico Madrid in Munich on Wednesday evening. (@LFC)

Lallana is to be sidelined for ‘a couple of months, not weeks’ as he begins a rehabilitation programme with the club’s medical team. (@LFC)

Klopp on Lallana: "This is certainly not news we would have wanted. Unfortunately, Adam is out for a couple of months not weeks."

Klopp: "I think we can pretty much rule him out of August and September."
